class.rdfs:comment: A product or service offered by a bank whereby one may deposit, withdraw or transfer money and in some cases be paid interest.
class.rdfs:label: BankAccount

schema:accountMinimumInflow.rdfs:comment: A minimum amount that has to be paid in every month.
schema:accountMinimumInflow.rdfs:label: accountMinimumInflow

schema:accountOverdraftLimit.rdfs:comment: An overdraft is an extension of credit from a lending institution when an account reaches zero. An overdraft allows the individual to continue withdrawing money even if the account has no funds in it. Basically the bank allows people to borrow a set amount of money.
schema:accountOverdraftLimit.rdfs:label: accountOverdraftLimit

schema:bankAccountType.rdfs:comment: The type of a bank account.
schema:bankAccountType.rdfs:label: bankAccountType
